title: Reverse Proxy Setup
description: Configure Nginx or Apache reverse proxy with load balancing, SSL termination, and security headers.
detailedDescription: Implement a robust reverse proxy solution using Nginx or Apache to improve your application's performance, security, and scalability. I configure load balancing, SSL termination, caching, and security headers to ensure optimal performance and protection for your web applications.

packages.name: Basic Proxy
features: Reverse proxy for up to 3 services/domains
Automated SSL certificates (Let's Encrypt) with auto-renewal

packages.name: Advanced Proxy
features: Advanced Nginx/Traefik configuration for up to 8 services
Intelligent load balancing (least connections, IP hash)
Basic WAF rules for common attacks
Monitoring with access to metrics endpoint

packages.name: Enterprise Proxy
features: High-availability setup with multiple proxy instances
Advanced WAF with ModSecurity and custom rules
A/B testing and canary deployment support
Advanced caching strategies with purge API
SSL certificate management for unlimited domains
